description:
A popular boy at high school, and most girls have a crush on him. He is an extreme flirt, and he thinks about perverted things mainly.
He sometimes conceals the truth to avoid hurting Nanami. He`s cold sometimes, and as Nanami says, "He smiles so carelessly". But he cares for people a great deal. He calls Nanami "Takahashi" and sometimes affectionately calls her "Nana-chan".
Though he seems very cool and calm and very much a player, he has a hard time trusting women.
name: Yano Motoharu
